name: Spaghetti chemise with leavers

one_liner: Ideal as a warm nightdress or as unconventional long camisole for daily use.

name: Spaghetti chemise with satin
description: Spaghetti chemise made of the finest flat knit fabric in pure Egyptian Makò mercerized Cotton (Filoscozia®)  with an elegant and feminine sleek satin edging and adjustable shoulder strap.
